items: Stand or sit with your back straight and shoulders relaxed.
Slowly lower your chin towards your chest, keeping your back straight and shoulders relaxed.
You should feel a stretch in the back of your neck and upper back.
Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds.
Gently lift your head back up to the starting position.
Repeat the stretch 2-3 times.
Relieves tension in the neck and upper back muscles
Improves flexibility in the neck and spine
Reduces headaches and neck pain
Helps improve posture
Can be done anywhere, anytime, without any equipment
